description:
It’s New Years Eve. Haruka, who had promised to make a visit to the shrine with Yuuto and Shiina’s group, hears about the early-day memories of Ouse-Misaki from Akiho. It is said that if you go to that cape with the person whom you want to be with, the two are guaranteed to be together. Akiho had been there with Gentou before, where they saw the first sunrise and exchanged a kiss. Haruka, hearing that story, hopes to go to that cape with Yuuto after their visit to the shrine…however, on their visit to the shrine, not only Shiina’s group is there, but many of Haruka’s underclassmen fans from school are there, and she is unable to find the chance to talk to Yuuto…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 身体が, 熱いんです......
